bscSapTable.name: bscSapTable
bscSapTable.description: A table containing configuration information about all the service access point.

bscSapEntry.name: bscSapEntry
bscSapEntry.description: The parameters for a particular service access point.

bscSapNumber.name: bscSapNumber
bscSapNumber.description: Identifies the service access point by a numerical value. This value is used as a index in the saps table. Values are unique per service access point.

bscSapRowStatus.name: bscSapRowStatus
bscSapRowStatus.description: Indicates whether the particular service access point is configured within the MIB. Service access point entries (rows) may be created by setting this object value to 'valid', or deleted by changing this object value to 'invalid'. Whether or not the row actually disappears is left to the implementation so this object may actually read as 'invalid' for some arbitrary length of time.

bscSapType.name: bscSapType
bscSapType.description: Identifies the service access point by type:'lower' identifies a SAP leading to a physical BSC port. 'Upper' identifies a SAP acting as an internal inter-layer logical port.

bscSapInterfaceType.name: bscSapInterfaceType
bscSapInterfaceType.description: Identifies the type of controller: either TIU or HIU.

bscSapAlias.name: bscSapAlias
bscSapAlias.description: Identifies the service access point by a textual name. Names are unique per service access point.

bscSapCompanionAlias.name: bscSapCompanionAlias
bscSapCompanionAlias.description: Identifies the `lower' service access point that will communicate with this service access point by a textual name. Names are unique per service access point. Used to bind the BSC Sap with the COP driver sap.

bscSapSnalcRef.name: bscSapSnalcRef
bscSapSnalcRef.description: Identifies which upper sap is associated to the lower sap within the BSC module. Applies only to lower BSC saps.

bscPollIntAfterAckTimer.name: bscPollIntAfterAckTimer
bscPollIntAfterAckTimer.description: This object applies only to a service access point functioning as a TIU. Determines the length of time allowed to elapse between the reception of an acknowledgment to a poll and the transmission of the next poll. Certain control units require a delay in order to successfully respond to polls. Since multiple BSC logical links may share the same SAP (i.e., multiple control units communicating on the same physical link), this timer applies globally to all logical links using this SAP. Range of values: 1 - 250 (in tenths of a second), a value of 0 disables the timer.

bscSapControl.name: bscSapControl
bscSapControl.description: Control associated with the specified service access point.

bscSapOperationalMode.name: bscSapOperationalMode
bscSapOperationalMode.description: Identifies the service access point as being active or non-active with the new configuration.

bscSapLinkStatus.name: bscSapLinkStatus
bscSapLinkStatus.description: Indicates the physical status of the sap with respect to its associated cop.

bscSapLinkChange.name: bscSapLinkChange
bscSapLinkChange.description: Indicates the number of times the physical link has been brought up.

bscSapOverrun.name: bscSapOverrun
bscSapOverrun.description: Identifies the number of block overrun's received by this sap.

bscSapParityError.name: bscSapParityError
bscSapParityError.description: Identifies the number of blocks received with parity errors.

bscSapCrcError.name: bscSapCrcError
bscSapCrcError.description: Identifies the number of blocks with CRC errors.

bscSapBlockReject.name: bscSapBlockReject
bscSapBlockReject.description: Identifies the number of blocks received whose frame size is greater than that configured.

bscCuTable.name: bscCuTable
bscCuTable.description: A table containing configuration information about all the 3270 controller units.

bscCuEntry.name: bscCuEntry
bscCuEntry.description: The parameters for a particular controller unit.

bscCuSapNumber.name: bscCuSapNumber
bscCuSapNumber.description: Identifies the sap associated with this controller unit. Each controller unit has an address and the address has to be unique with one sap. However, the address is not required to be unique between saps. This object is an index in the sap Table. Values are unique.

bscCuNumber.name: bscCuNumber
bscCuNumber.description: Identifies the address of this controller unit. The address has to be unique for a specified sap.

bscCuRowStatus.name: bscCuRowStatus
bscCuRowStatus.description: Indicates whether the particular service access point is configured within the MIB. Controller unit entries (rows) may be created by setting this object value to 'valid', or deleted by changing this object value to 'invalid'. Whether or not the row actually disappears is left to the implementation so this object may actually read as 'invalid' for some arbitrary length of time.

bscCuMaxBlockLength.name: bscCuMaxBlockLength
bscCuMaxBlockLength.description: Identifies the maximal length of the blocks exchanged between the host/terminal and the BSC module. The value is measured in octets and is specified by the BSC protocol. The DEFVAL value will be 'block3000' or 'block256', depending if the sap is configurated as 'hostInterfaceUnit' or 'terminalInterfaceUnit' (see the object 'bscSapInterfaceType').

bscCuPollTimeout.name: bscCuPollTimeout
bscCuPollTimeout.description: Identifies the number of seconds a station waits for an answer. The value is measured in tenth of seconds.

bscCuDelayTimer.name: bscCuDelayTimer
bscCuDelayTimer.description: Identifies the number of seconds the emulated station may delay the sending of a block. Timer is in tenth of seconds.

bscCuRetryCounter.name: bscCuRetryCounter
bscCuRetryCounter.description: Identifies the number of retries are executed, before a command fails. It is used by the host/terminal and the BSC layer.

bscCuETBAck.name: bscCuETBAck
bscCuETBAck.description: Identifies if the acknowledgement is local or end to end for ETBs. The ETB is a trailer block delimitator.. The 'endToEnd' means each block is acknowledged to the sender after receiving a confirmation from the remote BSC. The 'local' means the block is acknowledged locally. The block initiator is notified the block was received by the peer BSC layer.

bscCuETXAck.name: bscCuETXAck
bscCuETXAck.description: Identifies if the acknowledgement is local or end to end for ETXs. The ETX is a trailer command delimitator.. The 'endToEnd' means the command is acknowledged to the sender after receiving a confirmation from the remote BSC. The 'local' means the command is acknowledged locally. The command initiator is notified the command was completed by the BSC layer. It doesn't garranty the command was completed by the remote BSC.

bscCuControl.name: bscCuControl
bscCuControl.description: Control associated with the specified service access point.

bscCuOperationalMode.name: bscCuOperationalMode
bscCuOperationalMode.description: Identifies the service access point as being active or non-active with the new configuration.

bscCuConnectionStatus.name: bscCuConnectionStatus
bscCuConnectionStatus.description: Indicates the X25 connection status of this link.

bscCuConnectRequest.name: bscCuConnectRequest
bscCuConnectRequest.description: Number of connection requests coming from the upper SNALC layer.

bscCuDisconnectRequest.name: bscCuDisconnectRequest
bscCuDisconnectRequest.description: Number of disconnection requests coming from the upper SNALC layer.

bscCuDisconnectIndication.name: bscCuDisconnectIndication
bscCuDisconnectIndication.description: Number of disconnections sent to the upper SNALC layer.

bscCuEndToEndConnectCnf.name: bscCuEndToEndConnectCnf
bscCuEndToEndConnectCnf.description: Number of end-to-end connections seen by the controller. Message sent by the Snalc.

bscCuSnalcRxRnr.name: bscCuSnalcRxRnr
bscCuSnalcRxRnr.description: Number of RNR 's received from the SNALC module due to X.25 or LLC2 flow control.

bscCuSnalcRxRr.name: bscCuSnalcRxRr
bscCuSnalcRxRr.description: Number of RR 's received from the SNALC module due to X.25 or LLC2 flow control.

bscDevTable.name: bscDevTable
bscDevTable.description: A table containing configuration information about all the devices controlled by this module.

bscDevEntry.name: bscDevEntry
bscDevEntry.description: The parameters for a particular controller unit.

bscDevSapNumber.name: bscDevSapNumber
bscDevSapNumber.description: Identifies the sap to which this device is attached.

bscDevCuNumber.name: bscDevCuNumber
bscDevCuNumber.description: Identifies the address of the controller unit to which this device is attached.

bscDevNumber.name: bscDevNumber
bscDevNumber.description: Identifies the address of this device. The address has to be unique for a specified for a controller unit.

bscDevRowStatus.name: bscDevRowStatus
bscDevRowStatus.description: Indicates whether the particular service access point is configured within the MIB. Controller unit entries (rows) may be created by setting this object value to 'valid', or deleted by changing this object value to 'invalid'. Whether or not the row actually disappears is left to the implementation so this object may actually read as 'invalid' for some arbitrary length of time.

bscDevType.name: bscDevType
bscDevType.description: Indicates whether the device is a printer or a display.

bscDevControl.name: bscDevControl
bscDevControl.description: Control associated with the specified service access point.

bscDevOperationalMode.name: bscDevOperationalMode
bscDevOperationalMode.description: Identifies the device as being active or non-active with the new configuration.

bscDevConnectionStatus.name: bscDevConnectionStatus
bscDevConnectionStatus.description: Indicates the current status of the device's logical connection with regard to the network.

bscDevState.name: bscDevState
bscDevState.description: Indicates the state of this link.

bscDevSSDeviceBusy.name: bscDevSSDeviceBusy
bscDevSSDeviceBusy.description: The current bit information found in the last status sense message received/transmitted.

bscDevSSUnitSpecify.name: bscDevSSUnitSpecify
bscDevSSUnitSpecify.description: The current bit information found in the last status sense message received/transmitted.

bscDevSSDeviceEnd.name: bscDevSSDeviceEnd
bscDevSSDeviceEnd.description: The current bit information found in the last status sense message received/transmitted.

bscDevSSTransmissionCheck.name: bscDevSSTransmissionCheck
bscDevSSTransmissionCheck.description: The current bit information found in the last status sense message received/transmitted.

bscDevSSCommandReject.name: bscDevSSCommandReject
bscDevSSCommandReject.description: The current bit information found in the last status sense message received/transmitted.

bscDevSSInterventionRequired.name: bscDevSSInterventionRequired
bscDevSSInterventionRequired.description: The current bit information found in the last status sense message received/transmitted.

bscDevSSEquipmentCheck.name: bscDevSSEquipmentCheck
bscDevSSEquipmentCheck.description: The current bit information found in the last status sense message received/transmitted.

bscDevSSDataCheck.name: bscDevSSDataCheck
bscDevSSDataCheck.description: The current bit information found in the last status sense message received/transmitted.

bscDevSSControlCheck.name: bscDevSSControlCheck
bscDevSSControlCheck.description: The current bit information found in the last status sense message received/transmitted.

bscDevSSOperationCheck.name: bscDevSSOperationCheck
bscDevSSOperationCheck.description: The current bit information found in the last status sense message received/transmitted.

bscDevTestRequest.name: bscDevTestRequest
bscDevTestRequest.description: Number of test request messages received.

bscDevHostWrite.name: bscDevHostWrite
bscDevHostWrite.description: Number of host initiated write commands.

bscDevHostRead.name: bscDevHostRead
bscDevHostRead.description: Number of host initiated read commands which need a direct response.

bscDevHostControl.name: bscDevHostControl
bscDevHostControl.description: Number of host initiated control commands.

bscDevCuShortRead.name: bscDevCuShortRead
bscDevCuShortRead.description: Number of controller initiated short read commands.

bscDevTxBlocks.name: bscDevTxBlocks
bscDevTxBlocks.description: Identifies the number of blocks transmited by this controller unit.

bscDevRxBlocks.name: bscDevRxBlocks
bscDevRxBlocks.description: Identifies the number of blocks received by this controller unit.

bscDevStatusSense.name: bscDevStatusSense
bscDevStatusSense.description: Identifies the number of status/sense messages received by the device.

bscDevError.name: bscDevError
bscDevError.description: Identifies the number of blocks in errors (other than BCC) received by this controller unit.

bscDevErrTimeout.name: bscDevErrTimeout
bscDevErrTimeout.description: Identifies the number of timeouts for this controller unit.

bscDevCircuitEnable.name: bscDevCircuitEnable
bscDevCircuitEnable.description: Number of device connection requests (or enable) coming from the DSP module through the upper SNALC layer.

bscDevCircuitDisconnect.name: bscDevCircuitDisconnect
bscDevCircuitDisconnect.description: Number of device disconnection requests (or disable) coming from the DSP module through the upper SNALC layer.

bscDevCircuitRequest.name: bscDevCircuitRequest
bscDevCircuitRequest.description: Number of circuit requests sent (TIU) or received (HIU) to/from the DSP module through the upper SNALC layer.

bscDevTxCommands.name: bscDevTxCommands
bscDevTxCommands.description: Number of complete commands transmitted to the host or controller/device.

bscDevRxCommands.name: bscDevRxCommands
bscDevRxCommands.description: Number of complete commands received from the host or controller/device.

bscDevTxRvi.name: bscDevTxRvi
bscDevTxRvi.description: Number of transmitted RVI's to the host. (HIU).

bscDevRxRvi.name: bscDevRxRvi
bscDevRxRvi.description: Number of received RVI's from the controller/device.

bscDevTxTtd.name: bscDevTxTtd
bscDevTxTtd.description: Number of transmitted text delays, TTD, to the controller/device.(TIU)

bscDevRxTtd.name: bscDevRxTtd
bscDevRxTtd.description: Number of received text delay's, TTD, from the host.(HIU)

bscDevTxWack.name: bscDevTxWack
bscDevTxWack.description: Number of transmitted WACK's to the host.(HIU).

bscDevRxWack.name: bscDevRxWack
bscDevRxWack.description: Number of recieved WACK's from the controller/device.
